stories.text: I see lot of great and informed comments from specialists and experts in HN comments on any topic. Is there a way to synthesize this knowledge towards actionable intelligence? Professional companies like GLG, AlphaSights, GuidePpoint try to do this but is there a more scalable technical solution based on ML/AI?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some ways to synthesize HN comments into actionable knowledge?

stories.text:
Not really sure where the good freelance and part-time software gigs are these days.

Upwork feels like a sh* show. There is Topal but you have to jump through all their hoops. Is there anything else where the platform doesn't keep a % and you can just find good, wholesome freelance work?

Where are you finding them?
stories.title: Ask HN: Where are you finding freelance/fractional work?
